sentences.en: A stomach full of griddle cake stuffed with stewed meat , now that's what really counted!
sentences.cn: 穿着破衣,而把烙饼卷酱肉吃在肚中, 这是真的!

sentences.en: All stainless steel body, iron griddle, high efficient heating and temperature control function.
sentences.cn: 特性:不锈钢炉身, 精铁扒面, 高效能发热线及温控制功能.

sentences.en: He looked around at the others, nodded, and took another bite of griddle cake.
sentences.cn: 转圈看了大家一眼, 点了点头, 又咬了一截饼.

sentences.en: Heat a big rectangular cast - iron griddle or frying pan to a very high temperature.
sentences.cn: 先以高火烧热长方形大铁板或煎锅,加油2汤匙.

sentences.en: Heat a lightly oiled cast iron skillet or stove top griddle.
sentences.cn: 在铸铁平锅或者炉顶平底锅里涂上一层薄油,加热,撒上盐.

sentences.en: I'll be able to take a few more griddle cakes back.
sentences.cn: 得了,回头好多带回几个饼子去!

sentences.en: In a flat iron griddle heat up some oil over low heat.
sentences.cn: 将平底锅以慢火烧热,放上适量生油.

sentences.en: Oil griddle with butter, or spray it with non - stick cooking spray.
sentences.cn: 用黄油涂一下锅底, 或者用 不粘锅 的喷油.

sentences.en: Serve the pancakes hot off the griddle with warm strawberry syrup or maple syrup.
sentences.cn: 趁热吃,可以用草莓浆或者枫糖浆佐餐.

sentences.en: The griddle scone forms a sub - variety of the scone.
sentences.cn: 架子烤出来的 scone 是种子品种.

sentences.en: The result got the verification in griddle weave process, really rising to compare good actual effect.
sentences.cn: 以上模拟结果在筛网编织过程中得到了验证,起到了较好的效果.

sentences.en: The stiffness of a griddle body was enhanced using dynamic topological optimization under multiple frequencies constraints.
sentences.cn: 应用多频率约束下板结构加筋动态拓扑优化方法,提高了振动筛筛体的刚度.
